SimLauncher

Class SimLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimLauncher.SimLauncher

  • public class SimLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of the launcher. It contains the main function and what is needed for system's initialization

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The startpoint of the SimLauncher. It is responsible for 1. loading preferences.xml. If it loads default configuration 2. checks Java 3D's installation by searching jre directory for the needed files. 2.1. If jre directory is not found, the user is asked about its location 2.2 If java 3D is not found, the user is asked for installing permission 3. If something is wrong the user is informed otherwise the simulator is launched
        Parameters:
        args -

      • createPreferencesXML

        public static int createPreferencesXML()
        Creates preferences.xml consisting only of Preferences/Java/JRELocation/"C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jre7\\"
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if there was no problem or 0 if a ParserConfigurationException or a TransformerException had been thrown If errorLog is set it appends an error record.

      • savePreferencesXML

        public static int savePreferencesXML(java.nio.file.Path jreLocation)
        Updates preferences.xml with the new JRE location
        Parameters:
        jreLocation - The Path representing JRE location
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if there was no problem or 0 if a ParserConfigurationException or TransformerException or IOException or SAXException had been thrown. If errorLog is set it appends an error record.

      • loadPreferencesDefault

        public static int loadPreferencesDefault()
        Loads the default preferences, consisting of jreLocation = "C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jre7".
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if there was no problem.

      • loadPreferencesXML

        public static int loadPreferencesXML()
        Loads configuration from preferences.xml
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if there was no problem or 0 if a ParserConfigurationException or SAXException or IOException or NullPointerException had been thrown. If errorLog is set it appends an error record.

      • checkJava3DExistence

        public static boolean checkJava3DExistence()
        Checks if Java 3D is installed in the system.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all necessary files are present.

      • checkJRELocation

        public static boolean checkJRELocation()
        Checks if the spesified JRE location exists.
        Returns:
        Returns true if JRE Location exists.

      • installJava3D

        public static boolean installJava3D()
        Installs Java 3D. Specifically copies needed files to JRE location.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all files were installed correctly. Returns false if an IOException occured.

      • loadSimulator

        public static void loadSimulator()
        Loads FestoMPSSim.jar and terminates this jar. If an IOException or NullPointerException or IllegalArgumentException has been thrown, the user is informed and loading is aborted.
